-3+ years of relevant work experience and a Bachelors degree, OR 6+ years of
relevant work experience

and practices of BDD, ATDD and TDD

-Has played a major role in the delivery of high quality solutions, in a micro
services environment, across large cloud-native architectures

highly available cloud solutions
